settings.collapsible_content:
Peace of Mind, Guaranteed

All Outexer saunas come with a 5-year limited warranty and responsive support‚Äîso you can relax with confidence.

Learn more

settings.collapsible_liquid:
1. Are Outexer saunas low electromagnetic fields (EMF) and safe?
Yes. Our saunas feature low EMF heaters to ensure safe everyday use.

2. What kind of electrical outlet do I need?
Most 1-person saunas require a standard 120V/15A outlet. 2-3-person saunas typically require a 120V/20A outlet, and traditional/4-person saunas may require a 240V outlet. Please check the product specifications for exact power requirements, or ask our support team.

3. What should I do if my sauna arrives damaged or with broken parts?
We're truly sorry if your sauna arrives with any damage. Here's what to do:

  1. Take clear photos of the damaged area and the outer packaging (especially if there are holes or signs of impact).
  2. Contact our customer support at Support@Outexer.com with your order number and photos.
  3. We will send a replacement part free of charge as soon as possible. There's no need to return the entire sauna.

We'll make things right—your satisfaction and safety are our top priority.

4. What is the typical operating temperature? How long does it take to heat up?
Most Outexer infrared saunas can reach a maximum temperature of 149°F (65°C), and the warm-up time is typically 15-25 minutes. The gentle far-infrared heat works effectively without overheating your space.

5. Is it difficult to setup?
Not at all. All of our saunas are prefabricated and can be assembled in 30-50 minutes using only basic tools.

More FAQs

Customer service: support@outexer.com
Tel: +1 (424) 205-4342

Return Refund Policy
If your order has been processed, we will provide return and refund services under the following conditions:
1. If you want to return the product, please contact our customer service within 30 days after receiving the package (determine the arrival date based on the tracking information).
2. All items must be unworn, in original condition, with original packaging and all tags.
3. Damaged or wrong item received (Please check your order when you receive the item. If the item is defective, damaged or you received the wrong item, please contact us immediately so that we can evaluate the problem and correct it. We will resend the correct product or refund you unconditionally)
Learn more refunds & returns

„ÄêCompact 1-Person Indoor Sauna„Äë
The Outexer HY1 infrared sauna measures 33" x 28" x 62", perfectly sized for solo relaxation at home. Designed for indoor use, it features a towel rack and tempered glass for added style. Whether in your master bathroom, bedroom, basement, or gym‚Äîenjoy the luxury of an Outexer sauna in your own space, with a max temperature of 149¬∞F.

„ÄêPremium Canadian Hemlock & Entertainment System„Äë
Crafted from natural Canadian Hemlock, this indoor sauna is durable, beautiful, and heat-efficient. Equipped with an advanced entertainment system and two premium speakers, the 980W heating system reaches optimal temperature in just 30 minutes, delivering soothing warmth and immersive comfort.

„ÄêFar Infrared Wellness Benefits„Äë
Enjoy full-body rejuvenation from Outexer far infrared sauna therapy. From improving circulation and skin tone to relieving muscle fatigue and promoting better sleep, this spa room supports both physical and mental wellness. An integrated oxygen bar adds to the health benefits‚Äîjust relax and let the heat do the work.

„ÄêSmart Controls & Safety Features„Äë
Easily control time and temperature using the digital panel. Safety-first design includes dry burn protection, explosion-proof systems, automatic power-off, leak prevention, and ultra low-EMF infrared carbon panels that wrap your body in safe, consistent heat.

„ÄêReliable Support & Easy Maintenance„Äë
As a trusted infrared sauna company, Outexer¬Æ offers full post-purchase support with 24/7 engineer service. Setup is simple, and the seat and foot grid are coated with non-toxic water-based paint. After use, just wipe clean with a towel‚Äîready for your next personal sauna escape.

settings.custom_liquid:
FAQs

Order Processing and Delivery
How long will it take to receive my sauna?
We process orders in 1‚Äì3 business days, and shipping usually takes 5‚Äì12 business days. So you‚Äôll have your sauna delivered in about 6‚Äì15 business days from your order.

Do you offer tracking?
Yes, a tracking number will be emailed to you once the order is shipped.

What if my package arrives damaged?
üìå Cause: The package may have been crushed or bumped during shipping.

üí° Action: Please take clear photos of the entire box, shipping label, and SKU label. Then, record a complete unboxing video (if necessary). If you discover any damaged parts inside the box, we will immediately ship the damaged parts free of charge or arrange compensation.
Return and Refund
Can I return the sauna if I‚Äôm not satisfied?
Yes. You can return the sauna to the location provided by our after-sales customer service team. Refunds will be issued as long as the sauna is returned within 30 days of purchase, unused, and in its original packaging.

Who pays for the return shipping?
If the return is due to a product defect, we will cover the cost. Otherwise, the customer will be responsible for return shipping fees.

How long will it take to receive my refund?
Before shipment: 3‚Äì5 business days.
After shipment: 7‚Äì10 business days after the returned item is received.
Repair and Warranty
Do your saunas come with a warranty?
Yes, all Outexer saunas include a standard 5-year warranty. Feel confident in your purchase ‚Äî our dedicated support team is always here for you.

What if a part arrives damaged?
Please contact us immediately (support@outexer.com). We will send you a free replacement part.
Product Details
What material is used in the sauna?
We carefully select high-quality woods, including Canadian hemlock, African okoume, Douglas fir, and spruce‚Äîselected for their excellent insulating properties, durability, and natural beauty.

Is it difficult to install?
Not at all. All of our saunas are prefabricated and can be assembled in 30-60 minutes using only basic tools.

Is the sauna well insulated and waterproof?
Yes. Each unit is tightly sealed and provides excellent insulation. Outdoor models are waterproof and weatherproof, protecting against rain, sun, and snow.

Is the structure stable? Will it wobble when you sit in it?
Our saunas feature reinforced frames, sturdy wall panels, and secure joints. When assembled correctly, they are very stable and will not wobble during use.

How do I care for and clean my sauna?
After each use, simply wipe the interior with a damp cloth. Avoid using harsh chemicals‚Äîmild soap and water will suffice. After a sauna session, leave the door slightly open to allow moisture to escape.

What power supply does the sauna require? Can it be plugged directly into a wall outlet?
Most of our indoor, single-person saunas use standard 120V and can be plugged into a regular household outlet. Some larger or outdoor models may require 220-240V‚Äîplease check the product specifications for specific power requirements.

What are the health benefits of using a sauna?
Regular sauna use can help relieve muscle soreness and joint stiffness, improve circulation, promote detoxification, promote relaxation, moisturize the skin, and even improve sleep quality.

What are the health benefits of using a sauna?
Regular sauna use can help relieve muscle soreness and joint stiffness, improve circulation, promote detoxification, promote relaxation, moisturize the skin, and even improve sleep quality.

What if my HOA or local regulations do not allow outdoor sauna installations?
We recommend checking with your HOA or local authorities about building policies before placing an order. If outdoor setups are not permitted, you can still enjoy the same relaxation and health benefits by choosing one of our indoor sauna models, which are compact, easy to install, and HOA-friendly. üëâ Explore Indoor Saunas.
